rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: They [investigators] don’t know if the symptoms were related to it [the virus], and it [the virus being picked up in the nose] could have been that the virus was just picked up in the nose because of just inhaling it in. The second case is a case of conjunctivitis.
